str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
Pilate. Of Latin origin; close-pressed, i.e. Firm; Pilatus, a Roman.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Properly, to stare at, i.e. to discern clearly; by extension, to attend to; by Hebraism, to experience; passively, to appear.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To help, benefit, do good, be useful (to), profit. From the same as opheleia; to be useful, i.e. To benefit.
No one, none, nothing.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
More, rather. Neuter of the comparative of the same as malista; more) or rather.
(a) din, hubbub, confused noise, outcry, (b) riot, disturbance. From the base of throeo; a disturbance.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: (a) I receive, get, (b) I take, lay hold of.
Water. And genitive case, hudatos, etc. From the base of huetos; water literally or figuratively.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To wash dirt off. From apo and nipto; to wash off.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A hand.
From apo and enanti; from in front, i.e. Opposite, before or against.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From a derivative of echo; a throng; by implication, the rabble; by extension, a class of people; figuratively, a riot.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
(sometimes: unpunished), guiltless, innocent. Not guilty.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
This; he, she, it.
Blood, literally, figuratively or specially; by implication, bloodshed, also kindred.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 2nd Person Plural
str2: Properly, to stare at, i.e. to discern clearly; by extension, to attend to; by Hebraism, to experience; passively, to appear.
